Name: Maximize Team Velocity
Description: Enhance productivity by increasing average story points completed

Name: Minimize Sprint Duration
Description: Ensure rapid delivery by reducing sprint durations

Name: Maximize Feature Delivery
Description: Increase number of completed features per sprint

Name: Minimize Blockers
Description: Reduce the number of blockers impacting tasks

Name: Maximize Employee Utilization
Description: Optimize the allocation of employees to teams and tasks

Name: Maximize Stakeholder Satisfaction
Description: Ensure stakeholder needs are met via reviews

Name: Maximize Role Coverage
Description: Ensure all necessary Scrum roles are filled

Name: Maximize Certified Skills
Description: Maximize use of certified employees in tasks

Name: Minimize Task Overlap
Description: Avoid redundant work by preventing task duplication
